commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: There are so many students here at Nijigasaki, even though it's Sunday! This the type of school that's really heavy on the club activities?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, there are a lot of clubs that go to national tournaments.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Our school puts a lot of effort into club activities. Everyone's passionate about their practice.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: The really successful clubs have big, pretty rooms, too.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: If the School Idol Club starts getting successful... I really want to put a bed in our room.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That'd just make you sleep all the time. Not happening!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: With clubs this active, the school thrives! That's so cool!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I think so, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Huh? What's that girl doing? Here to observe, maybe? Wait, no one would observe a club at this time of year.)
Number five and number seven... They look like they became regulars based on seniority. And judging from their practice just now, there are more talented first-years.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Hmm?)

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hey, we're gonna leave you behind!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: O-Oh! Sorry, coming!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So, last night, I sent a message to this person named Kaoruko, the founder of the School Idol Festival.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Huh?! Yeesh, you're fast!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Shiny! A very you move.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: So, did Kaoruko reply?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! She said that she can't help us since she's working towards a new goal.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But she cheered us on, saying that if we want to do something, we should try it.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wait, what?! She's not going to help us?!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: But she is cheering us on.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Do what we want, huh? Well, that's pretty much all we can do.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Only way we can move is forward! Aye aye!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Giggle* In a way, that does sound like us, doesn't it? I'd say that's fitting.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: So, what are you thinking of doing and how?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, I talked it over with Honoka and Chika...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: And? Come on, don't hang onto it like that, out with it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I want us to take over the School Idol Festival Planning Committee!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: What?!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Wait, you mean we'll be the ones running the School Idol Festival?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! If we all band together, we can definitely pull it off!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: So, we're going to run the event? That's so exciting!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Let's rise to the occasion and put on a School Idol Festival that's just as good as the ones before!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yeah! Aqours has helped out with local festivals before, so we know a little bit about event management!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Heh heh heh! Well, you guys don't need to worry about a thing! You've got the number-one idol in the whole universe Nico with you, so this is all going to go well!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Now that's our Nico-chi! That's our super idol. How about you take that passion and find us a venue?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: H-Hey, wait a second! W-We're all doing that together, right?! Think of me as a mental pillar for everyone, I--

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh. So, the time has finally come for the fallen angel Yohane to unleash her power!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wow, that sounds kinda awesome! Counting on you!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yoshiko, could you lend us some of that fallen angel power, too?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: My name is Yohane!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: W-Wait, hang on, don't look at me with those bright-eyed gazes! Ahh, quit it, you're gonna purify me!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Man, Nico-chi and Yoshiko have some pretty good jokes on them! Let me join in with a pun or two of my own!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm not joking!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Me, neither! And call me Yohane!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, but can we really go and say we'll take over the Festival Committee? They won't get mad at us, will they?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Eeek! I-I don't wanna get yelled at!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Then how about we send them a message saying we want to take over, zura?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Or how about giving the committee head a call?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, good idea. I'll make the call!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ah, she didn't pick up. I wonder if an email would get the job done?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I would send one, then try another call tomorrow.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, good idea! Er, think this message is okay?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: "We just can't give up on the School Idol Festival. Kaoruko also told us to give it a try, showing her support."

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: "So would you mind if we tried to host the event ourselves? And would you like to join us, to give it one last try?"

commands.speaker: Honoka, Chika
commands.line: It's perfect!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then we'll have to decide what we'll actually do going forward!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: We're taking on this project among our three schools, so we'll have to make sure to keep in close contact.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hmm. Well, it might be a good idea for us to meet up regularly. I think a lot of things we can't deal with through phone or text will come up.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Where should we meet, then? Our group and Nijigasaki are in Tokyo, but Aqours is based in Numazu.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: How about we just meet in Tokyo? Let me take care of the logistics!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Oh-hoh, that's our Mari!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks, Mari! All right, let's meet every week and go over all the stuff!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And let's do our best to get the School Idol Festival going!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeahhh!
